named-query.name: Demografia.getResidentiAlCivico

named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT p, pc FROM SitDPersona p, SitDPersonaCivico pc WHERE p.codfisc = :codFisc AND p.idExt = pc.idExtDPersona AND p.posizAna = 'A' AND :dtRif >= NVL(p.dataInizioResidenza,TO_DATE('00010101','yyyyMMdd')) AND :dtRif BETWEEN NVL(p.dtInizioVal, TO_DATE('00010101','yyyyMMdd')) AND NVL(p.dtFineVal, TO_DATE('99991231','yyyyMMdd')) AND :dtRif BETWEEN NVL(p.dataNascita, TO_DATE('00010101','yyyyMMdd')) AND NVL(p.dataMor, TO_DATE('99991231','yyyyMMdd')) AND :dtRif BETWEEN NVL(pc.dtInizioDato, TO_DATE('00010101','yyyyMMdd')) AND NVL(pc.dtFineDato,TO_DATE('99991231','yyyyMMdd')) AND (p.dataEmi IS NULL OR (p.dataEmi IS NOT NULL AND p.dataImm is not null AND p.dataImm < p.dataEmi AND :dtRif BETWEEN p.dataImm AND p.dataEmi) OR (p.dataEmi IS NOT NULL AND p.dataImm is not null AND p.dataImm > p.dataEmi AND (:dtRif >= p.dataImm OR :dtRif <= p.dataEmi)) )

named-query.name: SitDPersona.verificaResidenzaByCogNomDtNascAllaData
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT p, pc FROM SitDPersona p, SitDPersonaCivico pc WHERE p.cognome = :cognome AND p.nome = :nome AND p.dataNascita= :dtNascita AND p.idExt = pc.idExtDPersona AND p.posizAna = 'A' AND :dtRif >= NVL(p.dataInizioResidenza,TO_DATE('00010101','yyyyMMdd')) AND :dtRif BETWEEN NVL(p.dtInizioVal, TO_DATE('00010101','yyyyMMdd')) AND NVL(p.dtFineVal, TO_DATE('99991231','yyyyMMdd')) AND :dtRif BETWEEN NVL(p.dataNascita, TO_DATE('00010101','yyyyMMdd')) AND NVL(p.dataMor, TO_DATE('99991231','yyyyMMdd')) AND :dtRif BETWEEN NVL(pc.dtInizioDato, TO_DATE('00010101','yyyyMMdd')) AND NVL(pc.dtFineDato,TO_DATE('99991231','yyyyMMdd')) AND (p.dataEmi IS NULL OR (p.dataEmi IS NOT NULL AND p.dataImm is not null AND p.dataImm < p.dataEmi AND :dtRif BETWEEN p.dataImm AND p.dataEmi) OR (p.dataEmi IS NOT NULL AND p.dataImm is not null AND p.dataImm > p.dataEmi AND (:dtRif >= p.dataImm OR :dtRif <= p.dataEmi)) )

named-query.name: SitEnte.getEnteByDescrizione
named-query.query: SELECT c FROM SitEnte c WHERE UPPER(c.descrizione) = :descrizione

named-query.name: SitDCodParentela.getParentelaByIdPersona
named-query.query: SELECT DISTINCT cp.value FROM SitDPersFam pf, SitDPersona p, SitDCodParentela cp WHERE p.id = :id AND pf.idExtDPersona = p.idExt AND p.dtFineVal is null AND sysdate BETWEEN NVL(pf.dtInizioDato,TO_DATE('01/01/1000','DD/MM/YYYY')) AND NVL(pf.dtFineDato,sysdate) AND sysdate BETWEEN NVL(pf.dtInizioVal,TO_DATE('01/01/1000','DD/MM/YYYY')) AND NVL(pf.dtFineVal,sysdate) AND cp.id = pf.relazPar

named-query.name: SitDStaciv.getListaValidi
named-query.query: SELECT s FROM SitDStaciv s where s.dtFineVal is null
